Somehow I find this very disturbing and somewhat confusing..
 
I just sent,=
 Via USPS, a rather expensive pattern welded sword to a client  
in Ireland=
 and he had no problem at all..and he has had no problems with 
earlier  sh=
ipments as well in either clearing Irish Customs or anything else.  
Why  h=
e would have no problems and why the Irish police would raid and 
confiscat=

swords =
go as  yet.
 
Maybe this is due to the fact that the swords I have been sen=
ding are  
historical replicas and those confiscated were not?
 
JPH
